Articles.Content:
I think they need a better camera system for things like docking. Now, I know there are mods that add better cameras for docking, like the lazor mod, but I prefer to play vanilla ksp, with no mods. So, does anybody think the vanilla ksp needs better camera systems, not necessarily for docking, but for everything (mainly docking though). I bought this up because I had a bad experience with one dock the other day. I kept on missing the docking port by several metres because I couldn't see the relative distance between the docking port on the ship and the docking port on the space station. So, who thinks new cameras are needed.

Edited October 13, 2013 by ToTheMun
I'm sorry, but this sounds a lot like "more camera modes", which is in the What Not to Suggest list. As such, I must lock this thread.
